entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 95
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 4 Photos of the special event 1992-1225 Evening Program, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 4 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1992.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
